name: AdGroupCreativeSet
desc: The assignment relationship between an ad group and a Creative Set.

items.name: adGroupId
items.desc: The unique identifier for the ad group.

items.name: campaignId
items.desc: The unique identifier for the campaign.

items.name: creativeSetId
items.desc: The unique identifier for the Creative Set.

items.name: deleted
items.desc: An indicator of whether the adgroupcreativeset assignment is soft deleted or not.

items.name: id
items.desc: A unique identifier for the adgroupcreativeset. Used to update an adgroupcreativeset.

items.name: modificationTime
items.desc: The date and time of the last modification of the object.

items.name: servingStatus
items.desc: The indicator of the status of an adgroupcreativeset assignment with an ad group. A Creative Set can only serve if the AdGroupCreativeSet status is Enabled and the ad group servingStatus is Running. If you assign the same Creative Set to another ad group, it may have a different status.

items.name: servingStatusReasons
items.desc: A list of reasons displayed when an adgroupcreativeset is not running.

items.name: status
items.desc: The user-controlled status to enable or pause the adgroupcreativeset.
